description:
Legendary Digimon Heroes are assembling to battle against Quartzmon turning the human world digital. But one more hero is needed and Tagiru has to fight the other Hunters for the spot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Hero Daishuuketsu! Digimon All-Star Kessen!!
The Great Gathering of Legendary Heroes! The Digimon All-Stars Showdown!!
伝説のヒーロー大集結! デジモンオールスター決戦!!
